Dialogs.Dialog: 小早川
This spot must be really nice in the spring.
By "this spot," you mean the cherry tree road？
Yeah. It'll be like we're walking under a pink tunnel. That must be amazing.
Yeah, that's true. It'll be romantic, too.
For something beautiful like that, I understand the feelings of people who like flower viewing.
I see. But you don't like flower viewing because it's usually noisy, right？
Yeah, those noisy drunk people are the worst.
That's true. But flower viewing is usually noisy everywhere in Japan.
That's uncivilized. We should appreciate the culture more quietly...
Do you think it's old people's bad habit？ You should know because you're an old man.
小早川
Hah... So hot... Rinko really can't stand the heat...
Let's rest under the tree. You'll feel better.
...Yeah, let's do that.
In the past, I was okay with summer though...
In the past...？
I wonder when I started to have a problem with summer...
Sorry. You don't like the heat, but I brought you here...
It's not your fault that the weather is hot like this, right？
If you buy me some juice, maybe I'll feel better. I give you one minute.
Five minutes, okay？ I'll be right back...
It's fall...
小早川
When I don't pay attention, a year passes in a blink of an eye...
The moment we're walking alongside each other like this will become the memory of the past soon.
...That sounds lonely. Can I walk closer to you？
To think about something like that, is it because of fall's ambience？
Maybe. Somehow, I think fall is a lonely season.
But, to have our memories together isn't bad, right？
Of course.
That's fine then. Let's make our memories together, including today's memory...
It's already winter.
小早川
I like the winter, but it feels a little sad when I see trees without leaves.
You can't wait for the spring, huh？
Spring...？ I hate insects but I can't wait to see cherry blossoms blooming.
But, I really prefer winter.
Why？ Isn't it cold？ Or is it because you can enjoy winter sports？
No. That's also one of the reasons, but the truth is...
When it's getting cold, we can keep being close to each other, right？
小早川
Ah, that's nostalgic.
Nostalgic？
Yeah, that tree. In the past, it was a special tree that Rinko always caught insects from.
Did you climb up on it？
I didn't. I think I used to tell you that I just picked up insects that were under the tree.
Hmm？ Shall we take a closer look at it？
Wait, it's okay from here.
But it's ▲小早川＊▲'s tree, right？ I want to look closer at it.
It's just the same as other tress around here. There's no need to do that.
It's okay, it's okay. Come on, let's go.
Geez... What's so fun about this？
小早川
I've never paid attention to these stairs before, but they are pretty long.
Even if you look from afar, you can tell that it's long too.
Maybe the number of steps keep increasing when we don't notice.
If you start to feel like the stairs are long, it might be that your health is deteriorating...
If you say so, how about we have a match？
A match？
Hey, wait！ Don't run off all of a sudden！
How's that？ I won.
I'm tired. Let's cancel the match.
What...？
Okay, okay. If you want to say that Rinko is getting old, just say it.
(Oh my...)
Since we're already here, do you want to draw a fortune？
小早川
I don't think we need to do that.
I think my luck is very good, so I'm fine with it.
Based on what？
I have such a cute girlfriend. That's why...
...Okay, okay. If you want to draw it, go ahead.
Bad luck...
Hmm...
But my love fortune is good. It says here, "Don't lose the one who's with you now."
...That's just a common sense. What a waste of time.
小早川
It was a nice movie. And I didn't expect that ▲小早川＊▲ would cry from it.
Huh？ I didn't cry.
In general, do you think there would be any couple that would have to go through so many misfortunes？
If they didn't make a story like that, it wouldn't be a movie.
During the scene where they had to part, how could they accept that condition？ As lovers, they should oppose.
That's true, but... You really paid attention to details, huh？
For such a movie that wasn't even close to reality, how could you say that I cried for it？
(But you cried, right...？)
It was fun. When I watch this kind of movie, I get an illusion that I become stronger.
小早川
What？ The action scenes were very repetitive. Explosion, fighting, then car chasing... They just mixed everything up.
I didn't expect that you'd be criticizing it in detail. ...You were watching it quietly though.
Isn't it... natural！？
Whoa, that's dangerous！
Huh...？ You avoided it. Let me tell you. My low kick isn't something easily avoidable.
(She's influenced by the movie！？)
How was it, ▲小早川＊▲？
小早川
...Hah.
What's wrong？
I laughed so much that I thought I'd die...
...What's with you？
To think of it, I usually dislike something when I haven't even tried it...
And when you actually try it, it turns to be fun, right？
...Yeah. Now that I accept it, I feel like I lost somehow.
(What did you lose to...？)
How was it？
小早川
It came out really nice. I was surprised.
Kids nowadays are picky, so children's movies must be high quality too, huh？
This one is based on a TV series, right？
This one is a remake. The original was aired around the time our parents were kids...
Hmm. So, the parents can bring their kids here and they can enjoy the movie together.
I think so. Animated movies can be appreciated by different generations.
Then the animated movies that we watched might be remade when we become adults, right？
That's possible.
So I should study more about animated movies, right？ I don't want the children to make fun of me then...
(Are you speaking about the future...？)
Ah, it was fun. ▲小早川＊▲, what did you think？
小早川
Just so-so. It's lacking something, right？
I see. I thought you'd like it because it involved scientific stuff.
That's not true. The main theme was human drama, right？ But they added so many action scenes that they became redundant.
...I-Is that so？
Somehow this made me disappointed.
...Well, shall we leave now？
Ah, stop. I want to buy a pamphlet.
(...Could it be that she actually likes it？)
(Rather than being scared, it's more like being hurt... I wonder if she realized that she kept pinching my hand.)
小早川
What？ Is there something stuck on Rinko's face？
Well... ▲小早川＊▲. Are you not okay with horror movies？
Not really？ Why？
Look. It's okay if you wanted to grasp my hand, but you were forcefully pinching me.
No way... Rinko didn't grasp your hand.
You did. And you pinched me so hard that it hurt...
That's because... I wanted you to experience the same pain that the protagonist had gone through...
I didn't want that！
小早川
Ah！ Geez... I got pins left on both sides！
So, the victory is mine then.
We don't know that yet. I might get those pins down.
But that's difficult. Anyway, there are many techniques that you can use...
Well, I don't know any technique. Why don't you show me？
All right. Then watch it.
...Here I go！
Yes, I did it！
That was awesome！
How's that？
Now, I got a spare, right？ Just a little bit and I can catch up with your score.
Eh？ What is this！？
Well, now it's your turn.
What is this...？ A time bonus？ If we can get a strike within 10 minutes from now, we'll get a gift from the store.
小早川
Hmm, they have something like this too？
What should we do？ Who's gonna try this？
I'll pass. It's not likely that I can get a strike.
Then shall I try it？
At a time like this, you can prove if you are an able man or not.
I have no choice, huh...？ Here I go！
Yes, I did it！ How's that！？ Am I an able man？
Awesome, awesome. You really did it！
What will I get as a gift then？
Ah, it's written here. A free rental coupon for bowling shoes...
...That kind of ruins the mood.
小早川
Ah, it went down the gutter again.
Don't mind.
This lane must be warped！ How could the ball fall down like that！？
That might be true. ...There's a trick to handle this though.
A trick？
All right... I'll try it.
Ah, really.
Right？
If you didn't teach me, how could I know this！？
(I just taught you and you're still mad at me...)
小早川
As I thought. This is what I call music！
That's good.
Ah, I'm still so pumped up！
I'm thankful that you like it, but if you don't cool down, you might collapse when you get home.
Don't ruin the mood. You just don't understand young people.
I'm only one year older than you.
But you talk and act like an old man. Are you sure you didn't lie about your age？
How could that be？
Then shall we go for all-night karaoke after this？
...Lack of sleep is not good for high school students.
Ahaha, you really sound like my dad.
How was it？
小早川
A little surprised... I didn't expect it to be this much fun.
Yeah, you got drawn into it, huh？
That guy who played saxophone was so cool. Why don't you try it？ Maybe I'll fall head over heels for you.
I can't play.
At least say that you'll try.
Then if I play very poorly, will you still listen to it？
No, wait until you can play like a pro before you show me.
(That would take a long time...)
小早川
...Hah.
What's wrong, ▲小早川＊▲？
...Somehow, this kind of music doesn't appeal to me.
Really？ Isn't hip-hop Western music, too？
Don't just add everything together. For me, what I listen to is like this...！
That's enough. People who don't understand will never understand.
I see. So you don't quite like it.
...That's not what you have to worry about. It's just my problem.
Well, to change the mood, how about we talk about the music that ▲小早川＊▲ likes？
Geez, if you act so mature like that, you'll make me look like a kid！
Haha, sorry, sorry.
That was nice, huh？ What do you think？
小早川
It was interesting.
That's good, then.
I had fun watching the guy who stood next to me.
The guy who stood next to you...？
Yeah, he screamed when each song started and he kept rocking his body with the songs' rhythms.
You should stop having fun with something like that...
Next time, I'll bring a video camera.
Video cameras aren't allowed here！
Okay, okay.
How was it？
小早川
Those girls next to us were screaming like they were watching an idol's concert.
Lately, comedians are popular among girls.
You're such a funny guy, so that's natural for you too, huh？
You flatter me... Wait！ Was that praise or not？
It was praise. A comedian's jokes get boring at times, but I've never gotten bored of you.
I can't tell funny stories though.
That's okay. You only have to entertain me. I don't want you to be entertaining others.
It's a girlfriend's privilege to enjoy her time with her boyfriend, right？
小早川
By the way, among those actors, are there any of them that also star on TV？
Yeah, lately, many of them also appear on TV shows.
Hmm, I see.
Although some of them just appear on TV for the first time, they already have a large fan base.
Hmm, I wonder if any of these actors we saw today will be appearing on TV.
I don't know. I didn't see anyone that really caught my attention.
...There has to be someone. Well then, if the person Rinko chooses appears on a TV show later, Rinko wins.
(I don't think that's something you can win or lose...)
小早川
Hah, I'm exhausted.
Good job. That song was added recently, right？
Yeah. Lately, they have increased the amount of Western songs here. Now there are a lot of songs that I can sing.
Anyway, seems like I'm the only one singing. How about you pick some songs？
I'm okay just listening to you.
It's just the two of us here. You don't have to feel embarrassed. Ah, I want to listen to this. Can you sing it？
All right. Then can you enter the code for me？
Okay.
...How's that？
That was great！ Why didn't you sing earlier？
▲小早川＊▲, you sang well and I prefer listening to you.
That's such a waste for you. Now, here. You sing this song. Come on. Encore！
(...Now, I'm in a tough situation...)
I did it, I did it... Well, what's my score...？
小早川
For a while now, you've only picked songs that you had to shout.
If I can get good scores with those songs, I don't have any problem.
It feels like my blood pressure is getting high just by watching you. To sing like that, doesn't your throat hurt？
I see... So ▲小早川＊▲ is worried about me, eh？ I won't sing like that anymore then.
Okay, that's good. Ah, since you're taking a break, how about we order something to drink？
Right, can you order something for me？
Okay, then... Ah, awesome. They have this super hot chili drink. Okay, you'll have this.
Hey！！？
▲小早川＊▲. Hey, I'm thinking about singing this song. What do you think？
小早川
That duet？
Yeah, since we're already here...
Singing a duet alone？ That's pretty sad. You have to have two people.
I can't sing it alone！
I know, you want to sing it with me, right？ Duets are made for lovers anyway, so I think it's okay.
Then it's decided.
...Hey, isn't there something wrong here？
...I entered the wrong code！ I'll change it now.
Boo~！ Too late. My mood for a duet has gone already. Pick some punk rock, the upbeat one.
小早川
Eh...？ It stopped...？ No way...
...I guess we just have to wait until it moves again.
...Yeah, that's what I think, but...
Say... How about we hold hands until it starts to move？
...Hmm.
Ah, it's moving.
Haha, it should've waited a little bit. We were in nice mood.
...Thanks.
This is amazing. We are really high above the ground.
小早川
It's weird. I thought only kids would enjoy watching the scenery from the Ferris wheel.
That can't be. What do people do on a Ferris wheel if they don't watch the scenery？
Well, the Ferris wheel is like a private room.
Private？ Well, that's true.
This is where people can spend some private time together, right？
I guess.
I'm sorry. Then... Are you expecting me to do something？
Wait-- ...You idiot！
小早川
Urgh... I feel awful...
You're that scared？ Are you okay？
No, I feel sick from walking in the dark...
Then are you okay？ Shall we rest？
It's okay. I'll recover in no time.
Don't overdo it...
...Urgh. You scolded me.
Because you don't look okay at all.
Yah！
Ouch！
See？ I'm okay, right？
I see... Urgh...
小早川
They're selling something at the entrance. What's that？ A charm？
I've heard about it. They sell that charm for people who feel very scared.
What？ If they're scared that much, they shouldn't have come here in the first place.
Shall we buy it then...？ ▲小早川＊▲, can you wait for me？
It's not really that necessary...
Is this because we had this charm with us？ ...This thing is cool.
Really？ I think it's normal.
Wow, then shall we try entering without this charm on then？
I object！
小早川
Phew, it was fun.
Yeah, that kind of thrill was irresistible.
Shall we ride it once more？
Just once more？ I can go for more.
Hmm？ If you say so, let's have a match.
...Urgh, I'm exhausted.
What's wrong？ Tired already？
Compared to a guy like you, Rinko is such a feeble girl.
Um... Are you joking...？
I am being angry！
Sorry, sorry.
By the way, ▲小早川＊▲, you're pretty good with this kind of thing, eh？
小早川
Of course.
It's really high...
Hey, are you scared？ Your face looks funny.
Sorry, but I'm not very good with this.
Tsk, what a miserable guy.
Hey, we've passed the most thrilling spot. Now, you can change your facial expression to normal.
Your hair is all messed up. It's so funny！
(She's just so cruel...)
小早川
Do you think this kind of thing has a hypnotic effect？
Why did you say that all of a sudden？
Well... Looking at the light makes me feel like everything in my head has gone blank.
Are you getting dizzy from the light？
Maybe. I don't know.
Shall we leave this spot and find a place to rest？
No, I'm not getting sick or anything. And I still want to watch this.
...It can't be helped. If you feel sick, just hold onto my arms, okay？
Okay... Thank you.
That one that just passed us was the new stuff for this parade.
小早川
Eh？ Which one？
The giant doll that was running in front of the wagon with ribbons. It was advertised in a magazine.
Ah, geez. I didn't even see any wagon with ribbons.
It's gone very far now. What do you want to do？ Shall we run after it so that you can see it？
...I'm fine. It's crowded and we can still see it next time.
But it's on show this week only.
...Is it really worth watching？
Since we're already here, let's watch it.
...Well, if you insist... I think I want to see it now.
All right. Let's go.
...Okay.
小早川
Ah, geez. It's crowded！
Seems like everyone in the theme park has gathered around here.
I'm done here. Let's go somewhere else. Ah, how about we take the Ferris wheel and watch this from above.
We can't easily leave this place with the crowd around us like this.
But, we'll have to do something, right？
Well then... What do you want to do？
I got it. I want to kick you.
No, don't！ There's no reason for you to kick me.
I was just kidding. Why did you take it seriously？
Urgh...
Fine, we'll stay here. But you have to protect me and not let the crowd crush me, okay？
▲小早川＊▲, I wonder how far you can swim.
小早川
...Why？
I could see that you weren't very enthusiastic when you swam.
We came here to play. Why did I have to put so much energy into swimming？
But if you know how far you can swim, it kind of helps in some situations.
Some situations... Like what？
...Like when the ship is sinking or when there's a flood.
I don't think that knowledge will help me in those situations...
Well, yeah...
If any of those happens, isn't it better to learn how to save people's lives？
Like a life saver, huh？
Right, right. A guy who can do that stuff is just so cool.
Phew... I swam a lot... Now, I'm exhausted...
小早川
Hmm, you were great, huh？
I think I swam for quite a long distance.
Shall I give you a nickname？
You're not gonna call me "Dolphin Man," right？
...But I really can't think of anything else. What else can I call you？
None？ Why don't you try to come up with something？
Shark Man...
Is that even different from Dolphin Man？
The slide here got featured in a magazine for being the longest and biggest slide.
小早川
Hmm, the longest and biggest, huh...？
Wanna try it？
...We can try, but are you sure it's safe？
Huh？
Weren't there many accidents lately？ As a consumer, I have the right to know if it's secure, right？
...Hmm. That means you don't want to play it？
I didn't say that.
Well then, let's go！
Wait a minute...！ Hey, if we go for the highest one, will water get into my nose when I go down...！？
Coming here every once in a while to gaze at the stars isn't bad at all.
小早川
It would be better if they were real stars.
Yeah, it would be nice if we could go somewhere that has a clear sky full of stars.
At that time, will you explain the stars to me like they do at the planetarium？
I'll try to remember something.
Then I'll be looking forward to it.
Ah, the next commentary is starting...
Are you asleep...？
No...
(Even if I try to remember the commentary, it will be just a lullaby for her...)
小早川
A long time ago, my dad used to tease me that he would set up a planetarium in our house.
Hmm？ You like the stars that much？
Sort of. Around that age though.
I was really looking forward to it, but...
The shape of the room would make it difficult to set up a planetarium, right？
Yeah, right. After all, it didn't look much like a planetarium.
The planetarium is still the best place to watch stars then.
The best place is where we can watch the real stars, isn't it？
That's true.
That's why you should remember it, especially when we have a chance to stay until late during our dates, okay？
It's about to start... When it gets dark, I get kind of sleepy.
小早川
It's starting. You should be quiet...
(Oh no. I fell asleep...)
(...Eh？ ▲小早川＊▲ has fallen asleep too？)
(She might be tired. I'd better let her sleep a little longer.)
Hey, why did you fall asleep？
Eh？ ▲小早川＊▲.
'Morning. Are you awake？
Geez. You really fell asleep. This is so embarrassing.
(You fell asleep, too...)
小早川
I don't hate flowers, but there are insects here too, right？
Well, that's because flowers and insects are always together.
Well, that's true...
Oh, umm, look. Isn't that flower cute？
That's a carnivorous flower.
What！？
No way. That's more like it. Good luck, carnivorous flower！
(How she hates to lose...)
小早川
Stop, stop！
What's wrong, ▲小早川＊▲？
A bee！ There's a bee！
Huh, really？ Ah, there's one around you.
What！？ No way！ Get it away from me！
Let's not provoke it. We should leave.
I know... You should be careful as well, got that？
I'm good. If necessary, I can carry ▲小早川＊▲ and run.
I don't care about that. You can just sacrifice yourself and let Rinko get away from it.
Okay, leave it to me！
...She used me as a decoy？
小早川
Once you see a scientific name, don't you think you want to try to say it like a tongue twister？
What's up with you all of a sudden？
Come on. Try to say these three plants' names continuously.
First, Aglaonema commutatum warburgii. It's from the Arum family of decorative plants.
And... Erythrorhipsalis pilocarpa. Wow, it's a cactus？
The last one is... Ascocentrum ampullaceum album. It's an orchid.
Come on. Say it, fast.
This is very difficult... Right, you have to show me first.
You want Rinko to say it？
Come on, come on.
...Who'd be able to say something like this？
(Then don't force me to say it...)
小早川
...Phew.
Did you fall asleep？
No, I was listening... until halfway.
I see... Halfway, huh？
Somehow, when the songs weren't as aggressive, I couldn't get into the mood.
Aggressive songs, huh...？ I know there are some songs in classical music, but... they are more modern.
Hmm, that's weird. It's classical but it's also modern？
They keep the classic style, but they're actually modern songs.
Hmm, then what will those modern classical songs be called in the future？ Futuristic music？
...I doubt that.
小早川
It's pretty difficult to become an idol, huh？ I don't think I could ever do something like that.
They get criticized a lot, too.
And it really depends on people's tastes whether they will be liked or not.
That's right.
But there was a big audience today. Everyone cheered with loud voices and danced along...
Yeah, that was amazing.
The vitality of the fans, huh？
To think about it, they're pretty hard to handle...
Having just one fan is already tough. I can't imagine having that many fans.
One fan？ Does it mean that ▲小早川＊▲ also has a fan？
Yes. A very passionate one▼
小早川
Those actors and actresses were amazingly strong, huh？ They were singing, dancing, and acting simultaneously.
Yeah, those are things we can't easily imitate.
Why not？ You should try. I'll be watching, okay？
...▲小早川＊▲ should try it with me.
I don't have to.
I really can't do it here. There are so many people.
Eh？ You mean you'd do it at home？ You're so weird.
(How did it end up like that...？)
That was exciting. But they didn't really get hurt, right？
小早川
They probably get hurt sometimes. That's why they have to practice very hard. It's a real fight after all.
▲小早川＊▲, so you think that pro wrestling is real, huh？
Not really. But even if they have scripts, they still fight earnestly.
Anyway, the pro wrestlers are awesome.
Yeah, I think so.
All right. Shall we get their autographs？
For something like that, you need to join the fan club first, right？
It's okay. I heard that they wouldn't mind giving autographs to people.
...Sometimes, you have the courage to do some weird things.
The match today was exciting...
小早川
There were many strikes. The fans were cheering like crazy.
▲小早川＊▲, do you have a favorite baseball team？ If so, we can come to cheer for them next time.
The team that I like... is the team that wins the championship. I'll know them when the city starts celebrating them.
That's practical, huh？
It's okay, isn't it？ I don't play sports myself, so that much is enough for me to enjoy it.
(Somehow, this feels like bringing a housewife to watch a baseball game...)
小早川
I didn't expect that you'd like it this much.
At first I thought "Whoa, why are there this many people who like this stuff？" though.
But among these maniacs, there are also some music fan circles. I've never known that.
I'm glad that you like it here.
If there's something like this, I don't mind coming again.
...Well, just don't get too absorbed with it, though.
That's not what I plan to do. The fact that it's so crowded that it makes me feel tired doesn't change.
Yeah, right. It's very tiring.
I kept thinking that I wanted to kick people away to make room for us to walk.
(That would be dangerous...)
小早川
Hmm, so this is the night view everyone has talked about, huh？
What's your impression？
Well, it's just so-so. Those lights that I thought were stars are actually street lights.
Is that so？ I think girls would like this kind of place though.
Not all "girls" are the same. They are they. Rinko is Rinko.
This is difficult...
And do you know what this difficult Rinko is thinking now？
...It'd be nice if you tell me.
Although the view is so-so, it isn't bad to watch it with you. That's what I'm thinking.
小早川
Ah, hey. Don't look over there.
What is it all of a sudden？
The couple next to us is kissing！
Eh！？
I told you not to look！
Geez, why are they doing that in front of this many people...？ Young people have no sense of decency nowadays！
Everyone seems to come here to do that kind of thing... Rather, the only couple that looks out of place here is us...
No, no！ If we stay here, we'll become one of those idiot couples！ Let's go.
小早川
Hmm, even an iron bridge like this one shakes when the wind blows.
It's distributing the forces and it's actually more durable than a bridge that doesn't shake.
It also teaches us a lesson that we can't always deal with things head-on.
What was that？ Were you talking about Rinko？
It's just a general consideration. You must have heard it, right？
No, I haven't. Since you were facing me when you said that, I thought you were preaching me.
Sorry.
Rinko is doing pretty well. She has an older boyfriend, but she can manage to take control of him, you know？
(Is that's what she's been thinking...？)
小早川
People who come to the beach must be very confident with their bodies, right？
I think there are people who don't really care about that, too.
I don't think so！ See that woman with huge breasts？ Her waist is so small it makes me wonder if she has any internal organs.
You worry too much.
But people do need attention, right？ Like whether others will look at them or not...
Let me see...
Why are you looking at Rinko？
I think you aren't drawing people's attention here.
...If you already know that, then stop staring at me！
Whew, what a nice swim.
小早川
I don't think there's anyone who comes to the ocean to seriously swim like this.
Don't people come to the ocean to swim？
I wonder. I rarely see people who do that.
Look around us. There are only couples and families who come here to just play around.
I guess you're right...
People who want to swim in the ocean are minority and quite out of place here.
I feel like I'm being blamed for this. Why？
Take this swimsuit kick！
Ouch.
Did you ever think about the girlfriend you left behind when you went swimming！？
It's already this late... We've been playing a lot, huh...？
Oh, look at that, ▲小早川＊▲. The sunset is beautiful.
小早川
We always see the sunset.
Don't say that. Watching the sunset from here is different.
If the sun turned blue or something, that would be worth watching. You could ask me to watch it then.
In that case, we should go watch it from Mars.
...Eh？ The sun is blue on Mars？
It seems so. I saw it on TV.
Then... I'll watch it when we go to Mars.
In that case, you should watch it from the Earth first so that you can compare them later.
Geez, I have no choice now...
小早川
Shall I take off my shoes？
Hey, that'd be dangerous.
Hehe, it feels great walking barefoot.
You already took them off.
Why don't you take them off too？
I'm fine.
You old man！ If you don't want to, then don't.
Okay, okay. I'll take them off.
Now then, let's walk into the sea.
(It's rare to see her being happy like this...)
小早川
The ocean is so quiet in winter that I don't really know what we can do here. It's freezing and the water is very cold.
Yeah... Huh？ Something's there... Is it a message in a bottle？
Eh？ What？ Is there something written on it？
Wait a minute... Well... It says, "For our love to last forever"...
...What is this？ A couple's wish？ Or just trash？
You're so cruel to call it a trash.
But it's just a piece of trash, isn't it？ It causes trouble to the one picking it up.
Then instead of returning it to the ocean, I should just put it in a trash can, huh？
That'd be bad for the idiot couple who wrote it！
小早川
Wow, a lot of stars...
In the winter, it feels like the stars get closer to us.
Right. In fact, the starry sky in winter is the most beautiful.
Hmm, that one is Orion, right？ At least Rinko knows something like that.
It's like something we can always see.
But it's getting cold. We can't always come to watch it like this.
At that time, Rinko has her special hand warmer to use, right？
...Okay, okay. I'm always available for you to use.
Hehe...
小早川
I've read somewhere that when guys come to the aquarium, a lot of them feel that the fish look delicious.
I see.
But I don't think there's anyone who would say that these fish are delicious when they see them.
That one looks like it's edible.
Eh？ Really？
But whether I want to eat it or not is another issue.
No, I can't. What kind of person would think about eating it when it's staring at you with those round eyes？
So, somehow you kind of feel guilty, huh？
Yeah. And normally, Rinko doesn't like to eat fish.
(So that's the reason, huh...？)
小早川
Like this one, I think many living creatures are like space aliens.
Yeah. Especially, those deep sea fish. They really look like space aliens.
Yeah, yeah.
And octopi are Martians.
What？ That's obsolete.
...Well, whatever. Anyway, which star do you think the sunfish come from？
...Sunfish planet？
Sunfish planet... Pretty good answer...
N-No way... I don't want a guy who joked about octopi are from Mars to make fun of me！
小早川
Speaking of which, there used to be a show where penguins were playing with a mirror...
A mirror？ Really？
The penguins would chase after their own reflections. They would turn their heads along the moving light. So cute.
Haha, I wonder if the penguins themselves had fun.
What's wrong？
That's right. They might not have fun. Rather, that thing might bother them...
You don't have to be so concerned about that...
Rinko is such a cruel person... It's a shock.
But penguins are birds, right. They probably forgot about that already.
Yeah...
小早川
For the penguins, do they feel cold when they stand on the ice？
They actually lift their toes a little bit, so their feet don't directly contact the ice. That's written in the pamphlet.
So, it's like fake stoicism？
Maybe.
Hmm, anyway, they're living their tough life.
They aren't just cute, huh？ That's like ▲小早川＊▲.
...I'm troubled when you put me together with different stuff.
Did I make you feel that bad？
You're so crafty when you say something like that！
Amazing. It feels like we're walking in the sea.
小早川
You exaggerated.
Is that so？ ...Eh？
What's wrong？
Someone was swimming in there.
Of course, that must be the staff.
Right... But does the staff swim in swimming trunks...？
Eh？ Then... I think you might've seen something else...
Yeah... I wonder what that was.
小早川
There are fish that will die when they stop swimming, right？
Like migratory fish？ If they stop swimming, they can't breathe.
That sounds tiresome. They can never rest.
Just like modern people.
People don't stop because they want to gain status in the society. But for fish, it's more like life and death.
Yeah.
What would they be thinking while they're swimming？ They probably won't beg for permission to stop swimming, huh？
I wonder if that's very stressful for them.
What do you mean？
It's like when I have to tell myself "I have to keep going！"
If those fish became as simple-minded as you are, then that might be true.
(You rank me even lower than the fish！？)
Oh, watch out.
小早川
Water got splashed on this part.
Now I know why they handed raincoats to people in the front seats.
But it's not necessary for those dolphins to make water splash like that, right？
You mean the dolphins intentionally made us wet？ No way.
They did. They're smart and mischievous.
...Now I recall that they are almost as smart as humans.
Geez. If they do this again...
What are you gonna do？
...Do you have any revenge plan？
...I don't think I have any.
Those dolphins are so crafty.
(But I think they're cute...)
小早川
Ah, they jumped.
It must be difficult to train them to do that.
But it seems like even the wild dolphins would jump like that when you play with them.
Hmm. Even though I think that's amazing, for the dolphins, it's just something normal, huh？
I guess so.
I see. It's nice to be smart and talented, huh？ And it's tiresome for those that have to put great efforts into things.
...Are we still talking about the dolphins？
About the dolphin's society as well.
小早川
Phew... I'm getting thirsty.
Then I'll go buy some juice. You wait here.
Okay, thank you.
Eh？ Where's ▲小早川＊▲？ Where did She go？
Where did you go？
Urgh...
W-What's wrong？
I really hate dogs...
Dogs？
A dog was chasing me so I had to run away. It was the worst...
Some people are feeding the seagulls.
小早川
What do they feed them？ I heard that it's not good to feed the animals human food.
I think there's a store that sells bird food.
That's pretty shrewd.
▲小早川＊▲, do you want to feed them too？
If I want to, will you feed them with me？
Okay, I'll go buy the bird food.
Wait up！
What？
The seagulls' food sold there is something like bread, right？
It's not gonna be living insects or fish, so you can relax.
Of course！ It's going to cause so much trouble if you feed something like that to the seagulls！
(But they're the seagull's main food, you know？)
The ocean breeze feels nice. I'm feeling sleepy.
小早川
You're gonna catch a cold if you sleep out here.
It's warm here, so I'll be fine.
I don't care then.
Good night...
Wait！
Whoa.
I didn't think you were really gonna sleep！
When your girlfriend is so concerned about your health, you should at least listen to her...
Sorry, ▲小早川＊▲...
Eh？ They have a souvenir store here.
小早川
Hmm... Ah, a mascot.
The sky tower's "sky puppy"？ Hmm... Very subtle...
They even sell something like that？ And the juices here are overpriced. What a greedy store.
Don't say it loudly！ The shopkeeper is watching us！
But for this kind of mascot, even Rinko can make a better one.
That's what I thought as well, but don't say it loudly like that！
Okay, I got it.
Now then, let's get going.
Ah, I'm gonna buy this sky puppy. Just wait for me.
You're buying it！？
小早川
For something this high up...？
I wonder if they can build a slide that goes down from here.
That's... quite impossible.
Wouldn't it be fun？
Who can guarantee its safety？ And it's gonna be so scary that no one wants to use it.
Rinko will use it.
No, you won't. I'd be worried sick about you.
Don't exaggerate... You'll be using it with me. It's gonna be fun.
I hope you keep things like this in your imagination...
▲小早川＊▲, where's your house...？
小早川
It should be... there.
Mine is over there... When we look from here, our houses are near...
It doesn't matter that our houses are near, does it？
But if our houses are near, we can meet up anytime we want.
...Rinko is right here next to you, right now.
The distance that we should be more concerned about isn't the physical distance, but the distance between our hearts, right？
(...▲小早川＊▲ is slow...)
(She's been in that dressing room for... 10 minutes already...)
(Could it be that... she fainted in there！？ This is bad！)
小早川
Ah, you idiot！ Don't look！
Eh？ You're wearing your old outfit？ Then why did it take you so long...？
That's because... the zipper got stuck...
What？ But now I feel relieved.
There's one more thing...
Don't open the curtain as you wish！
小早川
Lately, Mom often brings me along with her here.
She said that since I had a boyfriend, I must dress myself well.
She's such an assertive mother.
But Mom and Rinko have totally different tastes in clothing. So, every time I'm with her, I can only look around.
Why don't you just explain it to her？
She really enjoys it when she brings me here. I can't possibly tell her that.
I see. That's tough.
But Rinko also has fun just coming here together with Mom.
(That's good, ▲小早川＊▲...)
小早川
In the past, I had no interest at all in this kind of store.
Are you interested in it now？
I don't use cosmetics although I've tried a few. I don't want you to see my face if it looks weird.
Weird...？ But it can't be much different from your normal face, right？
...I know that, but as a girl, I have to worry about things like this！
I see... I'm sorry that I've never thought about it.
...It's good to be a guy. You don't waste money on this stuff.
Guys also have to worry about a lot of things...
Like to try to do your best？
...I've been doing my best, I think.
Very well, then.
(I can't slack off...)
Something smells good.
小早川
Does that store sell fragrance？
So, it's a perfume, huh...？ ▲小早川＊▲, you don't use perfume, do you？
You don't want me to use it？
Well... I think you shouldn't use it. I love the natural smell of ▲小早川＊▲.
What？ Do you have a smell fetish？
Fetish...？ That makes me sound like a pervert.
Because you are. You said you love Rinko's smell！
Did I say something perverted like that？
You did！
(But she really smells nice...)
This ring seems to suit ▲小早川＊▲ well. Do you want to try it？
小早川
...Huh？
See？ It looks good on you. All right, I'll buy it.
...But, isn't something like this quite expensive？
It's okay. It's probably just a little expensi-- Ack！
...It's not just "a little" expensive...
What a shame... Shall I put it back？
Well...
What？
I can't take it off...
L-Let's use some soap on it！
I was just messing with you！ What's this...
小早川
Ah, matching items...
You want them？
I don't.
Then why...？
Because... Wearing something like that would make us look like...
Look like what？
...An idiot couple.
Are you getting shy？
No. Those things are against my policies.
(Oh my...)
小早川
I wonder if there's something under this lake...
Something？ Like UMA, unidentified mysterious animal？
Yeah, there should be one UMA per lake.
What do you mean？
I don't think the shops around here are selling well... They'll make more profit if more people visit this place.
Is that so？
Rinko has to think up something...
How about a mysterious rare animal shaped like a girl that appears and kicks visitors. The name is Rin--
Hiya！
Now, I witnessed it...
There are fish here.
小早川
Of course. It's a lake.
By the way, ▲小早川＊▲, have you ever gone fishing？
Never. I kind of wanted to try it, but...
But？
The baits are...
Haha, worms, right？ But we can use other stuff as baits too.
I know that. But I also don't want to touch the fish. It feels yucky.
(If that's the case, how are you going to catch the fish...？)
There's a boat.
小早川
Eh？ I haven't been on one since I rode it with my dad when I was a kid...
All right. In that case, let's ride it, okay？
No, it's dangerous.
It'll be fine. Riding a boat would make our date an impressive one, right？
But, are you sure about it...？
It'll feel very good. How about we use that boat that's shaped like a duck？
...Say, aren't you embarrassed to ride on it？
A little embarrassed, but it's more important that I can spend some quality time with ▲小早川＊▲.
...I'd prefer a normal boat.
That's fine. Let's go.
Somehow... I feel like I'm being forced to do this...
Look. The coast is so far away.
小早川
If the boat sank, it'd be difficult to swim back.
Don't say that it'd sink like that.
But it's important that we should stay alert in case it happens.
I know it's important, but can't you stop mentioning it？
Well, at the crucial moment...
I'll carry you while I'm swimming, okay？
If you had such strength, that would be fine. But you don't have to overdo it.
I can do that.
For the time being, I'll be fine if you just hand me a swim ring.
(Can you at least trust me a little bit...？)
小早川
On TV shows or in comic books, there are often scenes when you ride this kind of boat and things suddenly become foggy.
Ghost ship, murder, or time travel scene...？ Or when the boat is about to sink？ There are also lake monsters, right？
Well, I hope nothing like that would happen here.
Wouldn't it be exciting？ We could be on TV shows.
Today, Rinko is more in the mood for something romantic.
I see. Then let's forget about what I said earlier.
Okay, there's nothing dramatic between us. But something like that is nice every once in a while.
小早川
Hmm. I didn't expect that there would only be a few people on this boat.
Right. I wonder if the company will be okay. Aren't they going into the red？
Why are you concerned about that？ It doesn't have anything to do with us.
But if it's gone when we come here next time, that won't be good, right？
...That's really not good, I think. Anyway, it's not like we can do anything.
How about we come here and ride this every week？
That's probably too much...
If we rescue them from their financial difficulty, maybe they would name this boat after us.
May I ask just in case...？ ...What name？
The Love Cruise: Rinko ＆ ▲名前▲！
That's the worst. Are you getting seasick？
Huh？ I think we're on the wrong path.
小早川
Eh？ Don't tell me we got lost.
If it's from here... We can take that route... No, that path would be much shorter.
Really？ Lucky.
Lucky...？ The real pleasure of hiking is when we reach the mountain top. You should wait until we're there.
I already feel the pleasure. So, I don't have any problem if we use the shortcut.
You're hopeless...
Hey, let's go.
Where is this...？
Sorry, I'm lost！
Huh...？
(She looks scary...)
What's wrong, ▲小早川＊▲？ We've almost reached the summit.
小早川
Eh？ We're not there yet... Hah...
Just a little bit. Do your best.
I can't... I'm so hungry...
Don't tell me you didn't eat your breakfast. You knew we would come here for hiking, right？
...But I stayed up until late last night and I barely had time for breakfast...
...We're almost there. Will you be okay？
Your face now looks like potato chip... Can I eat it？
Don't speak nonsense. Come on, let me carry your bag.
Thanks. You're such a reliable potato chip...
Stop, stop. If you start off with such a fast pace, you'll get very tired later on.
小早川
I'll be fine.
...But I'm getting tired now, let's take a break.
Geez. Why are you getting tired this easily？ Are you aging？
Yeah, my legs are getting...
How could you suddenly age like that！？
▲小早川＊▲, you're so cold...
Geez. I got it. Let's rest.
All right. Let's drink some tea.
And now you're suddenly so lively...
小早川
Ah... These ones would be nice as pressed leaves.
Eh？ That's quite unexpected.
The view here is very nice, so it's natural that I'm in the mood for something like that.
I see.
Let's pick the pretty ones while we're walking.
So, you want me to pick them, too？
Yeah, let's see who wins.
Who wins？ Wins what？
Based on size, color, and shape. We have 3 criteria.
How are you gonna judge？
We'll follow Rinko's rule book.
Hey！
小早川
These maple leaves really get in our way while we're walking.
Well... If we step on them, we might trip and fall.
This is like a trap.
Haha. Like, if you aren't careful and fall in one, you'll get damage, huh？
Yeah. But it's troublesome to have to be careful while we're walking.
...To think about it, you almost fell down once earlier, right？
...Did you see it？
Ah, I know it. That's why you started complaining about the leaves, right？
This and that aren't related.
But you really slipped, right？ To make sure you don't fall down, let's hold hands.
You're treating me like a kid again...
小早川
By the way, have you been practicing lately？
Not really practicing or anything. But I think I'm pretty okay with skiing.
In that case, how about you and Rinko try the advanced course？
Fine. I take that challenge！
Hey, that's a cliff！
But that might be one of the courses. There are people skiing there, too.
But... Rather than skiing down there, I think we'll be tumbling down instead.
Wanna go back？ There are people who take the lift down.
▲小早川＊▲, how about you？
Huh. If you're such a coward, you can just look after Rinko's back...
Grrr！ I'll do it！
小早川
Wait... No way！！
Are you okay, ▲小早川＊▲？
Geez... Why did the slope change all of a sudden？
Maybe someone made a jump platform here. Anyway, are you okay？
Of course, I'm fine... Ouch！
Are you really okay？ Got a sprain somewhere？
You don't have to worry that much. Somehow, it looks fake.
Hahaha. I don't think I can ever fake anything like that in front of ▲小早川＊▲.
That's rude. You're saying it like Rinko is a devil.
(But that's true...)
(Eh？ Where did ▲小早川＊▲ go？ No way. Don't tell me she gets lost.)
小早川
▲小早川＊▲. Where were you？
I was looking for you！
Eh？
Because you weren't here, some guys came and flirted with me！
While I wasn't here？ Really？
Really！ I was wearing these skis so I couldn't kick them. It was difficult to get rid of them.
...That's good to hear.
It's not good at all！
No, I mean... for them...
I can't kick you... But I'll hit you with these skis...
(It doesn't sound like she's joking...)
小早川
Do you understand this kind of fine art？
No, not at all. I'm just an amateur.
I see. They're normally like this, huh？
My little brother is really great at drawing. It'd be bad if people couldn't understand his artwork.
Do you want him to become an artist？
It's not like that. It's not good for other people to force him. He could lose his talent.
Hmm？ Is he that good？
I think he's still not there yet. Currently, he keeps drawing people with big heads and such...
(Isn't that just typical for a kid's drawing...？)
小早川
I've seen some paintings that look very gloomy. I wonder what the artists were thinking.
Well... I think the pictures represent the artists' state of mind when they painted them.
I've heard many people say that, but can people really paint what's in their heart？
I think they can. Their paintings reflect the artists' different points of view of the world.
I see... The world that I saw before I started dating you and the world I see now are also different.
How is the world you see now？
Well... I feel like it's warmer, and people around me also smile at me more often.
I see...
If people around me have changed like that, it might be that I've become gentler...
小早川
It's so crowded...
Speaking of which, I saw a sign about a drawing worth several billion yen being on display today. That might be why.
Do you want to see it？ It might be tiresome to do that though.
I've been training to push my way through the crowd, you know？
I'm okay though. Isn't it better if we go watch something else？
Really？ There are that many people going to watch that drawing, so I'm kind of curious how it looks...
But it's so crowded. You can at most take a peek. You won't have a chance to appreciate it.
That's true.
Okay, then. Today, we'll go look at something else.
小早川
I think it's legal to keep a giraffe as a pet.
As a pet？
Yeah, I don't know much about the details though.
Hmm？ Then ▲小早川＊▲, do you want it as your pet？
How is that possible？ I don't have a place where I could raise it.
That's right.
Anyway, if I want to have something as my pets, I'd rather choose men.
Yeah... What！？
...That reaction is the best ever.
小早川
Giraffes really have long legs.
Yeah...
I'm a bit worried that they might not be able to run in the Savannah with those slim legs.
Giraffes can run very fast, you know.
Really？
For a short distance, they can run as fast as 60km/h. This is written on the information panel.
Eh？ Way to go, giraffes. Ah, right. They can run fast because their legs are very long.
That's probably true.
And they also look good with those long legs... I feel like this is so unfair.
(Are you getting jealous of them？)
小早川
For the lions, one male lion usually hang out with many lionesses, right？
I wouldn't call that hanging out. More like they're building a group.
Is there a reverse pattern？ Like one lioness with a lot of male lions. Like a reverse harem.
I don't think that's ever happened with lions. It's unnatural for their mode of life.
That's unfair. A male lion is always surrounded by lionesses when it doesn't actually do anything.
The male lion has its own troubles. If it doesn't get respect as the pack leader, the lionesses would abandon it.
Even among the lions, the survival of the fittest also applies.
That's why you should treat males kindly. This is not restricted to only male lions, though.
Well, if the male human keeps doing his best, Rinko would try to understand him, okay？
These guys are called the king of the beasts, but it seems like they're quite sluggish.
小早川
Well, even if they are kings, they are in the same animal family as cats. They'd be carefree when it's time to relax.
That's right...
They'll be alert when they need to, right？
Even for me, I'll be alert if I need to as well.
...You should wait until you can dodge Rinko's kick before you say that.
Well then, if I can dodge your kick, you have to call me "King."
Are you ready？
...I won't do this.
Eh？
I'd wait until you're not prepared for it. That would be better proof that you're alert.
(When would that be then...？)
Hey, ▲小早川＊▲. How about you ride that pony？
小早川
But it's written on a sign that they only allow small children to do so, right？
I already asked and they said you would be fine.
What the...！ What do you mean by that？
They said that if you be kind to the pony when you ride it, that'd be fine. Wanna try？
No！ I won't！
It'd be fun, right？ It looks tame. And even if you fall down, I'm going to save you.
Don't treat me like I'm a kid. I absolutely won't ride it.
(Oh my. This one here is more difficult to handle than a stubborn horse.)
Ah, ▲小早川＊▲. There are rabbits over there.
小早川
Yeah... By the way...
Hmm？
They have been gathering around you since a while ago.
...That's right. I wonder why.
So, your pheromones even attract small animals, huh？
What's that？
See. Somehow these little animals seem to be fond of you.
Are you praising me or what？
I'm praising you... Yeah, you're like a big tree for them. Like when a hurricane comes, they'd feel safe being with you.
But I would have to face storm and rain. Even as a tree, that'd be tough.
At that time, you must give Rinko shelter too, okay？
(So, ▲小早川＊▲ thinks of herself as a little animal？ I think that suits her.)
